entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Liverpool
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:55 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 07:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: E 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Rain beginning in the afternoon except snow inland. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
